eye/item/section/list/catalogue/table of contents/order (taxonomy)/goal/name/title
allotment to a feudal noble

without giving due consideration/to ignore/to overlook

to pay attention to

sentences.english: The German paid no more attention to him, and it made him angry.
sentences.chinese: 那德國人不再睬他了，這使他很生氣。

sentences.english: Just pay no attention to him. None of your cousins dare to provoke him.
sentences.chinese: 你只以後不要睬他，你這些姊妹都不敢沾惹他的。

sentences.english: They swept in refusing to see their one-time friends.
sentences.chinese: 他們高傲地走了進去，睬也沒睬昔時的朋友。

sentences.english: What did you want to be when you were 8 years old?
sentences.chinese: 官定目下現古有中星人正在脣睬陸，您會如何做？
